title: Heartseeker/Sweet Heart Skins
body: Hello, just wondering why the Heartseeker/Sweet Heart skins are unavailable?

replies.body:
Some of our skins only come around during certain holidays or events to help celebrate the event, such as the Heartseeker Skins for Valentines Day! While we all love these special skins, they wouldn't mean quite as much if they were available year round. 

These types of skins are called Legacy skins, and you can read up on them in our [Guide to Legacy and Limited Skins](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).
